title: Virtual Educator Program: Introduction to Museum Resources
short_description:
Enliven your teaching practice with this virtual introduction to the Art Institute’s educator resources, hosted by two museum educators. Participants will receive an overview of museum resources, object-based learning activities, and strategies for accessing educator resource packets, thematic curricula, shareable image files, and more.

This session will take place via Zoom and is open to educators of all grade levels and subject areas.
